List of player commands:
.password Changing your password from your account.
.repair If your character can not enter the game (flying from ground, or loaded only up to the splash screen), use this command another character with the same account. She sends your character to the next, and move things to the warehouse.
.whoami For more information about your character.
.gettask Get a random assignment.
.declinetask Abandon the random assignment.
.offline Sets up offline shop.
